channel.title: Pages on Data Pathway
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Data Pathway

item.title: Himalaya Sharma
item.description: Born and raised in the steel city of Jamshedpur, India I have always been fascinated about technology and engineering. Curiosity accompanied with some fortuitous events led me to the world of machine learning and data science. Over the course of 3+ years in this sphere, I have leveraged data to solve complex problems. My work has spanned data analytics and machine learning for healthcare, computer vision, natural language processing. I’ve outlined my work experience and projects here - https://himalayasharma.

item.title: Our "data science expert"
item.description: Himalaya Sharma Born and raised in the steel city of Jamshedpur, India I have always been fascinated about technology and engineering. Curiosity accompanied with some fortuitous events led me to the world of machine learning and data science. Over the course of 4+ years in this sphere, I have leveraged data to solve complex problems. My work has spanned data analytics and machine learning for healthcare, computer vision, natural language processing.

item.title: Rohan Singla
item.description: An experienced, dedicated and highly motivated product analyst with a demonstrated history of working in automotive industry. Adept at managing projects involving economic planning, design and development of electronic components in a car. Proven ability to analyze market trends and customer needs for future products. A confident and charismatic presenter with an astute sense of building rapport and negotiation. Currently pursuing Masters in Management Sciences from University of Waterloo with a focus on Data Analytics.

item.title: Vivek Chauhan
item.description: As a seasoned data professional, I bring a unique blend of expertise in data engineering and machine learning to the table, all with a shared goal of enabling well-informed decision-making for organizations. With a robust foundation in these domains, I’m committed to helping organizations unlock the full potential of their data assets, with a track record spanning diverse sectors including IoT, pharmaceuticals, telecommunications, and retail. In my role, I seamlessly bridge the worlds of data engineering and data science.
